I finally tried Teresa Carles, and it certainly lived up to my expectations!  Full disclosure - i was invited to an event where we were treated to a special menu, for a Sunday brunch... so i don't know the prices.  But the flavors - excellent!  And the service was exceedingly friendly.  If you have the opportunity to ever try their Veggie Eggs Benedict (poached egg atop a bed of sauteed spinach with shitake mushrooms, caramelized onions) - served on a whole wheat english muffin - GET IT.  It was so good.  Same with their assortment of muffins and the banana bread.  Presentation was beautiful, service was great, ambiance was lovely... I'm sure the prices are on par with the quality.  Definitely worth a visit.
